entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA is a technology company that produces graphics processing units (GPUs) and other computing hardware. It benefits from strong demand for its Ampere architecture products and has seen increased revenue from gaming, esports, content creation, and streaming.

entities.name: MELLANOX
entities.description: Mellanox is a company acquired by NVIDIA in April 2020. It specializes in networking products.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA acquired Mellanox in April 2020, and the acquisition has contributed to NVIDIA's revenue growth in fiscal year 2022.
